name: Wheat
use: Used for making flour, bread, pasta, and other food products.

name: Rice
use: A staple food for a large part of the world's population, used in a variety of dishes.

name: Corn
use: Used as food for humans and animals, and in products like corn syrup, ethanol, and cornstarch.

name: Soybeans
use: Used for making soy products like tofu, soy milk, and as animal feed.

name: Potatoes
use: A versatile vegetable used in a variety of culinary dishes, from mashed potatoes to chips.

name: Tomatoes
use: Used in cooking, salads, sauces, and as a base for products like ketchup and tomato paste.

name: Cotton
use: Used primarily in the textile industry to make clothing, bedding, and other fabric goods.

name: Barley
use: Used in brewing beer, as animal feed, and in health foods.

name: Sugarcane
use: Used to produce sugar, molasses, and ethanol.

name: Peanuts
use: Consumed as food, used in making peanut butter, and in the production of oil.

name: Tractor
use: Pulling and powering various farm equipment for tasks like plowing, tilling, planting, and harvesting.

name: Combine Harvester
use: A multi-functional machine used for harvesting, threshing, and winnowing crops in a single pass.

name: Rotavator
use: An attachment for the tractor used for tilling the soil and breaking up large clods, making the soil smooth and ideal for sowing.

name: Seed Drill
use: An attachment for the tractor used for tilling the soil and breaking up large clods, making the soil smooth and ideal for sowing.

name: Cultivator
use: A machine that stirs and aerates the soil, helping to control weeds and prepare a suitable seedbed.

name: Harvester
use: Gathering mature crops from the fields.

name: Irrigation System
use: Providing water to crops through various methods like sprinklers, drip lines, or pivots.

name: Sprayer
use: A machine used to apply pesticides, herbicides, and fertilizers in liquid form across large areas effectively.

name: Power Tiller
use: A compact machine suitable for tilling, weeding, and small-scale plowing, ideal for small and medium farms.

name: Sugarcane Harvester
use: A specialized machine used to cut and collect sugarcane in large quantities.

name: Paddy Thresher
use: Separates rice grains from their stalks after harvesting, reducing manual labor.

name: Hydraulic Trailer
use: A trailer used for transporting goods on the farm, equipped with a hydraulic lift for easier unloading.

name: Laser Land Lever
use: Uses laser technology to achieve a uniform land level, improving water distribution and crop yield.
